item.title: [DISTRELEC-7682] WG: Reseller link to modify
item.description:
We have wrong redirect url for Belgium reseller shop.

The current link is wrong:

[1]http://www.teleson.be/en/products/components-and-interconnection/elfa-distrelec/

it should be

[2]http://www.teleson.be/en/products/components-and-interconnection/distrelec/

The requester(Thibaud from export department) also want this to be corrected on old elfa Webshop.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[1] http://www.teleson.be/en/products/components-and-interconnection/elfa-distrelec/
[2] http://www.teleson.be/en/products/components-and-interconnection/distrelec/

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

www.distrelec.com has some bugs.
All countries have been screened.
PL & DK give an error message and you cannot enter the Websites.
EE, SE, & LV link to NO
Attached you will find a screenshot.
Could you please fix?

Many thanks!!
Please check. Thx

PL and DK: This error is only within Distrelec network. Click on Advanced and accept to continue.

SE: Link is already ok: www.elfa.se

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7637] Better markup for warnings
item.description:
Issue #92025 has been updated by Andreas Bauer.
Assignee changed from Andreas Bauer to Rene Haemmerli
Hallo Rene,

wäre es möglich die Warningtext in ein HTMl-Element wie ein p oder span zu setzen?

Zur Zeit ist der Text:
"Warning: This product contains dangerous ingredients.
This can influence the delivery terms and conditions."

Direkt unter dem "li" Element untergebracht. Damit wir besser erkennen können, ob hier ein Warntext ausgegeben werden soll, würde uns entwerde eine CSS-Classe in dem li Element helfen oder das Verscheben des Textes in ein p Element.

Lösung 1:

<li class="warntext">
<h3 class="base">Environmental information<i></i></h3>
<div class="row">
<span class="title">RoHS</span>
No Information
</div>
Warning: This product contains dangerous ingredients.
This can influence the delivery terms and conditions.</li>

Lösung 2:
<li>
<h3 class="base">Environmental information<i></i></h3>
<div class="row">
<span class="title">RoHS</span>
No Information
</div>
<p>
Warning: This product contains dangerous ingredients.
This can influence the delivery terms and conditions.
</p>
</li>

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Erik Fries | ELFA Distrelec

Can you please take care of this?

If I understand the German description right, it's a just a matter of wrapping the warn text in a <p> tag, alternatively to add a "warntext" class to the <li> element? On which page is this to be done? Seems to be product detail page, correct?

I have put the warning text into a <span> tag with "warntext" class:

		<li>
			<h3 class="base">Environmental information<i></i></h3> 
			<div class="row">
				<span class="title">RoHS</span>
				Not Applicable
			</div>
			<div class="row">
				<span class="warntext">Warning: This product contains dangerous ingredients. This can influence the delivery terms and conditions.</span>
			</div>
		</li>
Committed to branch 4.0.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7635] Import Tool not working
item.description:
The import tool is not working anymore. At least for Export but I think for ALL.

To recreate:

  1. Fill cart with products
  2. export cart as excel file
  3. try to import the same file

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7631] Refactor webtrekk calls in Add To Cart buttons
item.description:
So far, "Add to Cart" tracking is done before the actual Add To Cart action.

It should be the opposite:

  • 1st: Add to Cart Action
  • 2nd: Tracking

Like this, we can avoid issues with Track-Blocking plugins likes Ghostery: DISTRELEC-7466
item.summary: Refactor webtrekk calls in Add To Cart buttons

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Please test after the next deployment

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7607] Removing all outbound links from Supplier/Manufacturer Pages
item.description:
Hi David, Rene,

As an immediate and very important request from Neil (…on the basis of the obvious intention of “not sending our traffic away from our webshop”), we need to remove all outbound links from our manufacturer pages. Currently we have no control over these pages. Therefore, I hereby request that all these outbound links are removed ASAP and we are given control of the component of these manufacturer pages to enrich the content and SEO potential of these.

I thank in advance for your fast action.

Cheers,
item.summary: Removing all outbound links from Supplier/Manufacturer Pages

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
@Ruben

This is an important ticket from the marketing.
Can you please take care of it.
Important to consider all outbound links, that means not only the logo but also when a direct outbound "text link" is provided. I attach the example that Neil requested.

Please test after the next deployment.
Thanks

The initial request was well fulfilled but now the Manufacturer Icons on the "product detail page" (which were all inbound links) don't work... "Notice the request was only on Manufacturer Pages and only for outbound links"
Fixed, please try again after the next deployment

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7598] Postal code validation for guest account is not working.
item.description: The validation of the postal code that is applied for B2B and B2C during registration for NL (maybe for all the countries) is not applicable when someone is ordering as guest account. As a result the orders are blocked and invoice cannot be printed in SAP.
item.summary: Postal code validation for guest account is not working.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Please provide the postal code validation format for the following countries:

  • NO
  • SE
  • LV
  • HU
  • PL
  • SK
  • RO
  • FI

Thanks.
Hi Evangelos, Could you please provide the validations which you've set on SAP side, so we can adjust? Thx

Hello Guys,
This is all I can offer. There is a length field as well as the country validation from the country ISO code that you can find online I guess.
I hope that helps

Rafael as I sent to my email postal code for NL should be 7 digits in total
1234 AB
There is a space in between

Hi Evangelos,
I already added the postal code validation pattern. Can be tested after next deployment.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7554] ELFA - shipping methods FE issue
item.description:
When selecting the shipping method "Komplektēšana/Izņemšana veikalā" then all other methods dissapear and are not selecatble anymore.

Please fix.

Applies at least to: LV, EE

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Hi Francesco,

I printed out the variable "selectedShippingOption.name" while reproducing the issue.
This variable gets empty after the reload when you change the Payment method.

Without this variable, there is no way no mark the radio button as 'checked'.
I can't find any issue FE side, can you have a quick look to the BE?

Thanks

This issue was related to ALL the websites.

Now it is fixed
Needs re-test on P after v4.0.7 release.

Please change "Sniedziet mums savu atsauksmi: mēs vienmēr priecāsimies saņemt ne tikai jūsu domas un ieteikumus, bet arī konstruktīvu kritiku." to this one here: "Sniedziet mums savu atsauksmi: mēs vienmēr priecāsimies saņemt ne tikai Jūsu domas un ieteikumus, bet arī konstruktīvu kritiku."

Thanks

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7466] 2 customers are not able to add products to the cart
item.description:
Infos from Zisan Merter:

User 1

  • user: p.wagner@ektronic.de
  • passwort: distrelec2015

User 2

browser:

  • Chrome: 44.0.2403.130m
  • mozilla: 40.0.2T
  • mozilla Version 3903
item.summary: 2 customers are not able to add products to the cart

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: customers cant add products to the cart at all

User 2 (B2C)

  • User: george.briner@polarion.com
  • password: distrelec2015
    ERP Contact ID: 1248312

the customer has allowed to use his login... Please don´t proceed accidently an order.

Hi Zisan

Can you ask the user using chrome to give us the list of all activated extensions in his browser?

We can not reproduce it with the browser version only. We think they have some special settings in the browser which maybe blocks java script.

Thx
Will
attached in word the firefox extensions of our B2C Customer --> mozilla Version 3903
I can reproduce the problem now with firefox 3903 and ghostery addon. This addon can block webtrekk and if configured like this, you cant add products to the cart.

Hi Angel

We have many customers in germany, who cant add products to the cart. Can we disable webtrekk for the add to cart function? It would solve this issue.

Thx
Will

Since we din't get a feedback and add2cart is more important than tracking.
We will remove the event tracking of the add2cart for now.

@Will
Please remove the tracking.
Please also check for other event tracking of webtrekk and remove them as well.
Thank you...

@Francesco

Will is not here, can you please take car of it.

Add to Cart tracking has been removed.

Please test after the next deployment.
Hi Zisan, this should be fixed in production with the rollout from the 31st of august on. Please inform the customer and let us know if it works in production thanks.

@Zisan

There have been some other tickets regarding this problem.
Some of them where also reported by you so I guess you should also inform those customers.
Unfortunately the other tickets are not yet linked to this, if you need we can help you to search for the those tickets.

Hi Rene,
the customers with the cart problem are daily more. Can you deploy this ticket today?
Between the customers we have many important Key account customers.

Hello Zisan

Unfortunately we cannot do this right now.

We are all working to prepare the rollout for this weekend
and we don't have time and resources to do a hotfix deployment and the testing for a production release.
So you will have to wait until the deployment this Friday (28.8.15).
This ticket belongs to a pre-release-candidate - Please test immediately in order to have possible bugs fixed until the Golive. Thanks!

@Will

Can you please test that on TEST with you plugin.
HI i have called one of our customers that can put items to the cart. He has still the same issue. please control it again.

@Will

Please check immediately!
I will check it now.
reproducable on P. On Q its working sporadically...
found out that "buy now" buttons on start page www.distrelec.de are working even if you block webtrekk.

ticket was committed to trunk and not to the branch, we check now if this is the problem.
-> same code level, this is not the problem

buy now button on P works! maybe we can implement the same button logic for the detail page and the all the other places.

http://jira.distrelec.com/secure/attachment/20018/screenshot-buynow-button-works.png

Hi Ruben

Check my last comment. This is maybe a quick possible solution. What do you think?

Thx
Will

I did some changes to (try to) avoid some calls to webtrekk. But I don't know how this plugins work inside...

Note that the use of this kind of plugins can screw up some website functionalities (Not only distrelec web):

"Blocking tracking can sometimes screw up the way webpages load unnecessarily" (http://www.digitaltrends.com/web/do-not-track-plus-vs-ghostery/)
Can you completely remove all the event tracking for web-track?

All click events tracking have been removed from webtrekk.js.

We should create another ticket to refactor the tracking.
Specially for the Add to Cart: Tracking MUST be done after the Add to Cart action is finished. Never before.

We should create another ticket to refactor the tracking.

Yes please create a ticket.
Please test on v4.0.7
This is now fixed in production. Please inform the customers.

Hi. Don´t work..
Customer 1059150.
He won´t give us his password. But he has sent me a screenshot from his issue.

Hi Zisan,
on P we currently have v4.0.6
We have to wait for the next deployment (v4.0.7) to test.

If you have the chance to talk with the costumer, please tell himto Pause temporarily his web-tracking plugin.

Thanks

Sehr geehrte Frau Merter,

Nein, es geht unverändert nicht - soeben nochmals versucht an einem anderen PC.
Mit freundlichen Grüssen, G. Briner

FM DE SCH Anfrage wrote:
Sehr geehrter Herr Briner,

leider konnte ich Sie telefonisch nicht erreichen.

Deshalb jetzt nochmal auf diesem Weg die Frage, ob Sie wieder Ware in den Warenkorb schieben können? Es wurden einige Änderungen vorgenommen.

Über eine Rückmeldung wäre ich sehr dankbar.

Vielen Dank im Voraus für Ihre Unterstützung.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7386] DE-OCI Wacker Chemie kann nicht bestellen
item.description:
Hallo,

Der Kunde Wacker Chemie hat Probleme mit unsere Website. Soweit ich verstanden habe liegt es am Enterprise Modus den der Kunde für den Aufruf der Frames aus dem ERP eingestellt hat. Eine Suche funktioniert nur auf der ersten Seite. die zweite Seite lädt unendlich. Im neuen Fenster öffnen (HMC) brachte auch keine Lösung, da jetzt die Scrollbalken fehlen.

Bitte dringende Klärung der Kunde kann nicht bestellen.

Herr H. Frank, Wacker Chemie Tel: 004986778370384 aus der IT kann hier weitere Details angeben.

Sorry for german language.
item.summary: DE-OCI Wacker Chemie kann nicht bestellen

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Customer is using IE11 with Enterprise Modus
https://www.distrelec.de/ociEntry?username=wacker-de-ger@oci.distrelec&password=hei2auX8&oci_version=4.0&hook_url=
Können sie es auch ohne "Enterprise Modus" versuchen oder wozu brauchen sie das?

What is Enterprise Mode?

https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/dn640687.aspx
Please ask customer directly, he has a good knowlegde (he is from the IT ) I don't understood the details.
Enterprise modus is necessary because of compatibility mode for ERP and IE11

Sorry, I couldn't take care of this, before my holidays.

@Rafael
Can you please call the customer, maybe together with Oliver.
I guess they run our shop in a iFrame.
Can you ask them if the shop work if they open it directly (not over OCI).
Then we could use then customer configuration to break out of the iFrame (like we did for Roche).

Thanks
René
Open directly is no Problem. changed in HMC setting "open in a new Window" then the scrollbars disapered.
Hi Oliver, did you had contact with that customer already?
yes, i tried all possibilities that i know in HMC with the customer. So I have no more idea.

Hallo Oliver, der Kunden soll folgendes probieren:

After the debugging with you experts I researched a bit about that iframe problem in an SAP-Frame.
I found a parameter you can set in the OCI call structure:

This deactivates the inner “back to sap” frame and it solved the Firefox problem.

If you have any more customers facing that problem you might tell them to add this parameter in their Distrelec call structure customizing (spro/define web service id).

Hi Rafael,
Checked with the customer already. Customer knows this Parameter.
Please call him!
Customer called me and asked about status? Can you please call Mr.Frank 004986778370384

Debugging session with Mr. Frank has been done and we see two possibilities to solve their problem.

  • fix the ajax calls in Enterprise Mode
  • fix the missing scrollbars when setting the customer config "new window"
Customer ask about status, what can i answer?

Hello Ruben

Can you please estimate and then start with the implementation.
I think the solution with the scrollbar could maybe fixed very quickly, much faster than analysing the Ajax calls.
What do you think?

@Oliver
I guess Ruben can fix this next week.
But we don't know yet we we will do the next deployment.

Hi Rene Haemmerli | Distrelec
I need a way to reproduce the error. Maybe you know how?
Thanks

Hi Rene,
Do you think it will deployed next week?
I informed the customer that it will be solved by the end of next week.

I need a way to reproduce the error. Maybe you know how?

Which problem scrollbar?

  • make a html which disables to scrollbar and then use a the oci link to check the configuration

Investigation continue.

I've detected javascript errors on IE (Enterprise Mode)

  • Object doesn't support property or method 'replaceState'
  • Object doesn't support property or method 'pushState'

Apparently old versions of IE (IE <= 9) don't support these two methods: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/3722815/does-internet-explorer-support-pushstate-and-replacestate

Hello Olivier,

I did some changes and I can't see the issue in my local environment.
However, this is quite difficult to test locally. So we have to wait for the P deployment (or at least the Q one).

Come back to me as soon as you have some feedback from the customer.
Thanks

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6495] Mega Fly Out // Import
item.description:
Please update the MegaFlyout on the Q-System now with the attached File.
When the update on Q was successful, please forward this mail to the person in CC.

Next steps:
1) You will update the MegaFlyout in Q-System using the attached file
2) You will inform the person in CC when the update is done
3) The person in CC will check in the Q-System if the update was as expacted
4a) if the person in CC replay the mail with "not approved", the person will start a new process. - So for you is the process end.
4b) if the person in CC replay the mail with "approved", the person will advise you to import the same file in the P-System.
5) if you have updated the P-System successful, inform the person in CC.
6) Ther person in CC will proof the P-System.
7a) if the person in CC replay the mail with "not approved", you have to find out with him, why and solve it!
7b) if the person in CC replay with "approved", the person will inform all needed persons including you. - For you is the process done. - Thank you!

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Estimate includes documentation
Hi Erik, please start with this tomorrow as we will have some Bugfixing tests with a lower version on Q this afternoon, thx.
Hi Erik, we have to finish this task urgently next week. Please contact me first before you start as we need to change some stuff in the file before we can import it. Thanks.

Hello Rafael,
as we talked, please assign the ticket back to me once you have the new excel file.
Thanks

Hi Erik, you will receive the new megaflyout file per mail today or tomorrow. Should first go to Q - please have a look at the process above. Please approach Ruben so he can show you how to do the import, thanks.
Hi Erik, did you receive the new file with ALL the translations conatined? Did Ruben show you how to import? Please wirte me an email if you have any news about it, thx.
Hi Erik, whats the status here? We need to update the megaflyout.
Ooops, I've totally forgot about this one. I will ask Ruben to help me today.
The file first received was not complete, got a new file today.
is this ELFA roll-out?

Hi Oana,
It's for immediate release to the live system after approval (by Samuel) in the Q system.
Committed to Q, waiting on approval from Samuel.
Approved by Samuel.
Erik, you can do the same for P then, thanks.
Updated file for new roll-out countries.
The .xlsm file and all .impex files updated and committed to trunk.
Updates for Denmark committed to branch 4.0.
